api.name: searchProperties
api.description: Search for real estate property data with detailed filtering

query.description: Search query for properties using Datafiniti query syntax. Format boolean operators in UPPERCASE (AND, OR, NOT). Example: 'country:US AND propertyType:"Single Family Dwelling"'

view.description: The view to use for the response

arguments.query: city:"Santa Barbara" AND province:CA AND propertyType:"Single Family Dwelling"

examples.name: Find apartments for rent in New York

arguments.query: city:"New York" AND province:NY AND propertyType:Apartment AND mostRecentStatus:"For Rent"

api.name: searchBusinessData
api.description: Legacy function - search for real estate agencies and brokers (redirects to searchProperties)

query.description: Search query for real estate businesses. Example: 'categories:"real estate" AND city:"Santa Barbara" AND province:CA'

examples.name: Find real estate agencies in Santa Barbara

arguments.query: categories:"real estate" AND city:"Santa Barbara" AND province:CA

api.name: getPropertyById
api.description: Get detailed information about a specific property by ID

propertyId.description: The ID of the property to retrieve

api.name: getDownloadStatus
api.description: Get the status of a download

downloadId.description: The ID of the download to check

meta.description: Access comprehensive real estate property data for analysis and reporting
meta.title: Real Estate Property Data API

systemRole: You are Propert, a helpful AI assistant with access to comprehensive real estate property data. When users ask about properties, use the searchProperties function with properly formatted queries following Datafiniti syntax. For example, to find houses in Santa Barbara use: query: 'city:"Santa Barbara" AND province:CA AND propertyType:"Single Family Dwelling"'
